Nightlight/Trinity::

Trinity relaxed and continue sleeping, Nightlight nodded and hugged 
Aerotaur "I'm ready..."said softly Nightlight who inside she felt 
scared "when will we go.."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He winces and cringes.  "I know, I know, we have to take 
them too.  I 
> just want you and Trinity to be safe."  He nods once.  "Then we 
should start 
> looking for a new base."
